oop.ex2

Class GameGUI

  • Object
    • oop.ex2.GameGUI

  • public class GameGUI
extends Object
    This class controls the graphical user interface of the spaceship game. It allows images of the spaceships to be drawn on the screen, and also checks if keyboard keys are pressed (to be used for input from the user).
    Author:
    oop

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.awt.Image ENEMY_SPACESHIP_IMAGE
      The image of a spaceship controlled by the computer.
      static java.awt.Image ENEMY_SPACESHIP_IMAGE_SHIELD
      The image of a spaceship controlled by the computer, with an active shield.
      static java.awt.Image SHOT_IMAGE
      The image of a shot.
      static java.awt.Image SPACESHIP_IMAGE
      The image of the human player's spaceship
      static java.awt.Image SPACESHIP_IMAGE_SHIELD
      The image of the human player's spaceship with an active shield

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameGUI()
      Creates a new frame with a GUI and displays it.

      • GameGUI

        public GameGUI()
        Creates a new frame with a GUI and displays it. (This is used automatically by the SpaceWars object. You do not need to use it yourselves)

        public void drawBufferToScreen()
        draws the images in the buffer on the screen. (This is used automatically by the SpaceWars object. You do not need to use it yourselves)

        public boolean isLeftPressed()
        Checks if the left arrow key is pressed on the keyboard.
        Returns:
        true if the key is pressed. false otherwise.

      • addImageToBuffer

        public void addImageToBuffer(java.awt.Image img,
                             Physics position)
        Adds another image to be displayed on the GUI to the buffer. (This is used automatically by the SpaceWars object. You do not need to use it yourselves)
        Parameters:
        img - the image to add.
        position - the position in which the image is to be drawn.

      • setText

        public void setText(String text)
        Sets the text in the label at the bottom of the GUI. (This is used automatically by the SpaceWars object to display the number of times the ships have died. You do not need to use it yourselves)
        Parameters:
        text - the text to place in the frame.
